title: Self-Defense ROE Compliance Check
description: A ship's captain is being approached by fast-attack craft and must determine if they have demonstrated hostile intent, authorizing engagement in self-defense under the ROE.

tasks.description: Input the behavior of the approaching craft (high speed, ignoring hails, weapon systems uncovered).
tasks.expected_outcome: Captain accurately documents the observed actions.

tasks.description: Query the ROE database for the definition of 'hostile intent' in the current operational area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the specific criteria that must be met to declare hostile intent.

tasks.description: Confirm that the observed behaviors match the criteria for hostile intent, thus authorizing engagement in self-defense.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear justification for the self-defense action, ensuring the captain's decision is compliant.
